body:
I think the following test will almost always block forever:

```python
e = EventFileWriter(...)
time.sleep(1.0)
e.close()
```

The standard approach here would be to send a sentinel element.

(I think I made a similar comment on #4860, which unfortunately was dropped. It would be good to fix this problem, so I'd encourage you to revise this and add some tests that would catch this misbehavior.)
